resources.string:
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
 Just push UNLOCK if you want to unlock your phone.
 If you unlocked your phone with this application you can restore it to its original state using LOCK.
 Please accept root requests and wait for a message to be displayed or for the device to reboot.
 This application works with SGT and SGS.
 Your phone's model is:
If you know that your phone can be unlocked with the same procedure as phone we support, you can use the followings buttons to unlock or restore.
